description: npmGrafStats Map Dashboard with InfluxDB v2.3 powered by https://github.com/smilebasti/npmGrafStats

panels.title: Real Connections (without monitoring services or internal calls)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections" or r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections" or r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IP")  
  |> group(columns: ["IP"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "alias")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections" or r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "IP")
  |> group(columns: ["_count"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections" or r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Name")
  |> group(columns: ["Name"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections" or r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_time=1m"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Redirections" or r["_measurement"] == "ReverseProxyConnections")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Domain"] =~ /^${domainquery:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "IP")  
  |> group(columns: ["longitude","latitude","IP"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

panels.title: Real IPs Map Overview (without excluded IPs)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

panels.title: All Accessed (with excluded IPs and internal calls)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IP")  
  |> group(columns: ["IP"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "alias")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "IP")
  |> group(columns: ["_count"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Name")
  |> group(columns: ["Name"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "_time=1m"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "count")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MonitoringRedirIPs" or r["_measurement"] == "MonitoringRProxyIPs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "IP")  
  |> group(columns: ["longitude","latitude","IP"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])

  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "InternalRProxyIPs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "MonitoringRProxyIPs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])
  |> count()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "_field", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
  |> group(columns: ["Domain"])

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Domain")
